ch0021_01_green/0101_0701_01_10:
There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I’ve been waiting on you forever!
ch0021_01_green/0101_0701_02_10:
I know you’re going out exploring again today,
right? You’re aiming for the top here in Pasio,
after all!
ch0021_01_green/0601_0701_01_10: Hey, check out this outfit. Pretty cool, right?
ch0021_01_green/0601_0701_02_10:
Some serious craftsmanship went into making it, so
it’s perfect for battles where I take center stage!
ch0021_01_green/0601_0701_03_10:
Losing isn’t an option in an outfit like this! That
wouldn’t be cool at all.
ch0021_01_green/0601_0701_04_10:
You’ll see! Blastoise and I are gonna show
everyone just how incredible we are!
ch0021_01_green/0602_0701_01_10:
Pasio is the perfect place for sync pairs to
grow stronger.
ch0021_01_green/0602_0701_02_10:
All you gotta do is go out and explore as much
as you can whenever you have time.
ch0021_01_green/0602_0701_03_10:
Spending time with your partner Pokémon lets you
learn surprising new things about it, and it gives
you a chance to reflect on yourself, too.
ch0021_01_green/0602_0701_04_10:
There’s a lot to be gained from it for both you and
your Pokémon.
ch0021_01_green/0603_0701_01_10:
The jets of water that Blastoise fires can even
pierce through thick iron plates!
ch0021_01_green/0603_0701_02_10:
With Blastoise by my side, I can blast right through
any obstacle!
ch0021_01_green/0603_0701_03_10:
Well, other than Red, that is. I still can’t figure out
how to beat him.
ch0021_01_green/0603_0701_04_10:
We’ll beat him one day, though! And, when we
do, Blastoise and I will be the strongest duo in
the world!
ch0021_01_green/0604_0701_01_10:
My Blastoise has been with me since he was
a Squirtle.
ch0021_01_green/0604_0701_02_10:
He’s always been a gutsy Pokémon and as loyal
as can be...
ch0021_01_green/0604_0701_03_10:
but he’s become even more reliable ever since
he evolved into Blastoise!
ch0021_01_green/0604_0701_04_10:
He’s my partner Pokémon, and I know he’s got
my back!
ch0021_01_green/0605_0701_01_10:
You’re another Trainer I’m focused on beating,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. Just like Red.
ch0021_01_green/0605_0701_02_10: I admit, I consider you a rival.
ch0021_01_green/0605_0701_03_10:
It’s a little scary to watch you get stronger and
stronger, but it’s also kind of exciting.
ch0021_01_green/0605_0701_04_10:
More strong Trainers means more worthwhile
battles—which is a plus, of course—but there’s
more to it than that.
ch0021_01_green/0605_0701_05_10:
Maybe I’m just happy to watch you grow and
mature as a person, too.
ch0021_01_green/1701_0701_01_10:
Yo! I was looking for you. There’s something I
want you to have.
ch0021_01_green/1701_0701_02_10:
It’ll definitely come in handy in your adventures.
Make good use of it, OK?
ch0021_01_green/1701_0702_01_10:
You can’t be a good Trainer if you don’t know
how to use items properly.
ch0021_01_green/1701_0702_02_10:
Knowing when to use each item is an important
part of strategy!
ch0021_01_green/2501_0701_01_10:
The most important element of Pokémon battles
here on Pasio is teamwork between sync pairs.
ch0021_01_green/2501_0701_02_10:
No matter how strong a single sync pair is, they
can’t make full use of that strength without proper
coordination with their team.
ch0021_01_green/2501_0701_03_10:
When I first battled alongside you, I was worried
that you might not be able to keep up with me.
Not anymore, though.
ch0021_01_green/2501_0701_04_10:
Now I consider you a trustworthy sync pair to
have by my side in battles!
ch0021_01_green/2501_0702_01_10: We’re here to help out when you’re in need.
ch0021_01_green/2501_0702_02_10:
I better not catch you trying to do everything
by yourself, OK?
ch0021_01_green/2501_0702_03_10:
I put a lot of trust in you. Feel free to return the
favor, too, OK?
ch0021_01_green/2511_0701_01_10: You should travel the world someday.
ch0021_01_green/2511_0701_02_10:
Sure, there’s no shortage of encounters here on
Pasio, but the world is full of mysteries waiting to
be discovered.
ch0021_01_green/2511_0701_03_10:
I’m not just talking about new people and
Pokémon, either. There are plenty of new things
to discover in nature, too.
ch0021_01_green/2511_0701_04_10: A Pokémon Trainer’s journey never ends!
ch0021_01_green/2511_0701_05_10:
I’m sure you’ll feel the same way when you see
just how big this world really is.
ch0021_01_green/2511_0702_01_10:
Traveling around the world can be pretty tough,
but I’m sure you’ll be fine.
ch0021_01_green/2511_0702_02_10:
You’ll always have your Pokémon by your side,
after all.
ch0021_01_green/2511_0702_03_10:
Besides, you can always rely on me, the mighty
Blue, whenever you’re in a tight spot!
ch0021_01_green/3002_0701_01_10:
You look like you’re still half asleep. All right,
think fast! Pokémon battle, right now! Relax, I’m
just messin’ with ya.
ch0021_01_green/3003_0701_01_10:
I had no idea this outfit would make such a big
difference. I feel way closer to my partner
Pokémon now. It’s like I’m never really alone.
ch0021_01_green/3005_0701_01_10:
All right, I’m turning in for the night. When you’re
as awesome as me, you take care of business
fast and go home early!
